title: Mother
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: 'My mum is my best friend and strength'.
description: Jannas Quayle pays tribute to her mother, a lady of great strength and warmth who has watched over her family and kept them together, depsite life sending them to different places.
